name: Desire
description: Désiré is a poetic point-and-click adventure game in black and white. From a tender age, he is going to meet several characters who will elicit in Désiré intense emotions. The game contains 4 chapters.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista 64bits Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon, Geforce with at least 512 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card with latest drivers Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
